comments.author: Ol Nicodemus.8104
comments.body:
Greetings! So, in search to find a way to really implement the API for mobile and web application use, I was hoping to create a forum here to talk specifically about where one might be able to learn how to use it. Of course, there is the Guild Wars 2 Wiki where you can view the documentation, and there is also Codecademy which is a fantastic place to learn the basics of many different types of code.

What I would like to do here is create a community based resource for novices and veterans can know where to start and get more specific information. Of course, there is YouTube and all that rubbish, but I want to find extremely helpful places to not just lecture but empower the learner to make his/her own iOS/Android/Web app. Now, if the YouTube video is really quite informative about a particular topic, please do feel to share. Even websites that help others to understand wrappers libraries and how to implement them would be helpful as well.

Things are always changing in this game, and I think it’s important for us to collaborate in order to take advantage of the tools we already have rather than waiting for the ‘Extended Experience’ app to get here.

Please, if you’re interested in participating, post a list of related sites to this thread as I’m about to do:

  • Guild Wars 2 Wiki: API (API Documentation)
  • Codecademy (Learn the different coding languages)
